tool_description: Get balance of a specific address for a variety of cryptocurrency
name: Cryptocurrency balance
title: Cryptocurrency balance

api_list.name: Get Chiliz Balance From Specific Network
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the Chiliz balance of an address in a specific network.

required_parameters.name: network
required_parameters.description:
network can take the value : 
- eth

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-balance.p.rapidapi.com/chz/eth/0xcc477b21d471fb9394a56aace72c8d59ac80f6af"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-balance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-balance.p.rapidapi.com/chz/{network}/{address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-balance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
